dct_description_sm: gravé par Chamouin, Rue de la Harpe No. 35 ; ecrit par Giraldon.
Relief shown pictorially and by hachures.
Coordinates are approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map, given in "Myriamétres," "Lieues Communes de France," and "Heures de chemin des Caravannes."
Shows topography, drainage, deserts, islands surrounding continent, political boundaries, routes.
Decorative cartouche with sphinx and palm trees.
Appears in Malte-Brun's Précis de la géographie universelle, Paris: Prudhomme, 1809.
